import React,{Fragment, useState} from 'react'; const PizzaCount =()=>{ const[pizzaData, setPizzaData]= useState({ smallPizza : 0, mediumPizza : 0, largePizza : 0, Children: 0, Adult:0 }); const { smallPizza, mediumPizza, largePizza, Children, Adult } = pizzaData; const addSmallPizza =()=>{ setPizzaData(smallPizza+1) } const removeSmallPizza=()=>{ if(smallPizza>0){ setPizzaData(smallPizza-1) } } return(
